attributes.action: take appropriate action again the English Football Association by reviewing its organisational structure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The outcome of this action would likely involve the removal of Brian Barwick from his postion, due to his proven incompetence in selecting the right manager for the English national football side. The results of this incompetence are clear, with a reported £1bn potential loss to the British economy next summer. Please allow the reported 'root and branch' approach see some of the chairman and board member sacked from their post and help the right people resume management of the fa and restore some pride and economic strength to the people of England.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
